description:
In this course titled ' Persuasion - 10 Principles Of Persuasion And Influence.' By Pradeep Aggarwal you will learn -

10 best tools of persuasion and influence, which many top influential people use.

You will learn the different ways to influence and persuade people to buy your product or service and influence a large gathering in a speech etc.

You will be able to understand people emotionally and arouse them to take action immediately.

You will be able to enhance your skills of influence and persuasion and get the maximum desired results.

This course is ideal for people who are into the field of sales , marketing, stage performers , public speakers, performers etc.

It is very useful for everyone who are required to influence and persuade people in their professional field.

The principles , if used effectively will make you one of the top most influential people in the world.

The course is in English and contains more than 30 minutes of live recorded lectures.
title: Persuasion - 10 Principles Of Persuasion And Influence
